text: فَإِن زَلَلْتُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْكُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: But if you deviate after clear proofs have come to you, then know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
translation.id.indonesian: Tetapi jika kamu menyimpang (dari jalan Allah) sesudah datang kepadamu bukti-bukti kebenaran, maka ketahuilah, bahwasanya Allah Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.
